What will I be living off in my old age?
features.description: Calculate your AHV & pension fund benefits at expert level. Pension analysis is the first application in moneto.

features.title: You can do it conveniently from home.
features.description: With moneto, you receive expert tools free of charge so that you can quickly and independently deal with your financial issues from the comfort of your own home.

features.title: moneto is your platform.
features.description: You always have your data under control. In contrast to most other platforms, moneto does not trade data.

rightSideDescription: Our advertising partners help to ensure the further development of the platform and enable the free basic use of moneto.
